Wisdom: أَزْكَى الْمَالِ مَا اكْتُسِبَ مِنْ حِلِّهِ
enWisdom: The purest wealth is that which has been earned by its lawful means

Wisdom: أَطْيَبُ الْمَالِ مَا اكْتُسِبَ مِنْ حِلِّهِ
enWisdom: The best wealth is that which has been earned by its lawful means
The purest of earnings is lawful earning

Wisdom: مِنْ تَوْفِيقِ الْحُرِّ اكْتِسَابُهُ [اكتساب‏] الْمَالَ مِنْ حِلِّهِ
enWisdom: Part of the success of a freeman (or a person) is his earning wealth through legitimate means

Wisdom: الْحِرْفَةُ مَعَ الْعِفَّةِ خَيْرٌ مِنَ الْغِنَى مَعَ الْفُجُورِ [الْفَجْرِ]
enWisdom: A [simple] vocation with modesty is better than affluence with immorality
